statements: SELECT * FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY equipment_id ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine Maintenance';
SELECT equipment_name, technician_id FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Emergency Maintenance' ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT equipment_name FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE technician_id = 12345 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC, technician_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_type, technician_id FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE equipment_id = 5 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;

SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, maintenance_type FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY equipment_name ASC, maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type LIKE '%ed%' AND technician_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY equipment_id ASC, maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT technician_id FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Emergency' AND equipment_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY technician_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, name FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT name, maintenance_interval FROM equipment WHERE maintenance_interval > INTERVAL '30 days';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_log WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT name AS equipment_name, maintenance_notes AS notes FROM equipment INNER JOIN maintenance_log ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_log.equipment_id;
SELECT equipment_id, name, maintenance_interval, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE name LIKE 'M%';
SELECT equipment_id, name FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, name, maintenance_interval FROM equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT e.name, m.maintenance_date, m.maintenance_notes FROM equipment e JOIN maintenance_log m ON e.equipment_id = m.equipment_id WHERE m.maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY m.maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT MAX(purchase_date) AS latest_purchase_date FROM Equipment;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY schedule_date ASC;
SELECT Equipment.equipment_name, MaintenanceLog.log_date, MaintenanceLog.description FROM Equipment JOIN MaintenanceLog ON Equipment.equipment_id = MaintenanceLog.schedule_id;
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM Equipment WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT log_id, description FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE description LIKE '%fault%';
SELECT * FROM Equipment JOIN MaintenanceSchedule ON Equipment.equipment_id = MaintenanceSchedule.equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_interval > 6;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceHistory ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT technician_name, experience_years FROM Technicians WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, next_maintenance_date, technician_id FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2022-09-01';
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NULL;
SELECT equipment_name, next_maintenance_date FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT maintenance_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, technician_name FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_type='Preventive';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_interval, next_maintenance_date FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_interval > 6;
SELECT schedule_id, equipment_id, notes FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE technician_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY schedule_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM Equipment;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, assignment_date FROM MaintenanceTeams INNER JOIN TeamAssignments ON MaintenanceTeams.team_id = TeamAssignments.team_id;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;

SELECT m.equipment_id, e.equipment_name, m.maintenance_description, l.maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceLogs m INNER JOIN Equipment e ON m.equipment_id = e.equipment_id INNER JOIN MaintenanceSchedule s ON m.equipment_id = s.equipment_id LEFT JOIN TeamAssignments t ON m.equipment_id = t.equipment_id WHERE s.maintenance_interval > 30;

SELECT t.team_name, COUNT(a.assignment_id) AS assignments_count FROM MaintenanceTeams t LEFT JOIN TeamAssignments a ON t.team_id = a.team_id GROUP BY t.team_name HAVING COUNT(a.assignment_id) > 2 ORDER BY assignments_count DESC;
